titleStmt.title: SII 13.79: original edition by G.V. Srinivasa Rao
No. 79. (A.R. No. 94 of 1933.) VĪRĀPURAM, CHINGLEPUT TALUK, CHINGLEPUT DISTRICT. ON A PILLAR SET UP NEAR A liṅga IN THE VILLAGE.

summary.p: This registers an endowment of land tax-free for the midday offerings to the deity in the temple of Uñchīśvarattāḷvār at Neḍuṅguṉṟam in Neḍuṅguṉṟanāḍu, a subdivision of Śembor-kōṭṭam, after purchasing it from the Ūrār (assembly) of the village by Viḍaṅgaṉ, the commander of the regiment called the Aṇukkabhīmarpaḍai. On account of the paleography of the inscription it has been assigned to the reign of Rājarāja I (M.E.R. 1933. II 22).

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . kovirājakesarivanmaṟku yāṇṭu 3- Ā
vatu Aṇukkabhimarpaṭai nāyakaṉ viṭaṅkaṉeṉ
cemporkoṭṭattu neṭuṅkuṉṟanāṭṭu neṭuṅkuṉ
ṟattu mahaātevar Uñcīśvarattāḷvārkku
tiruvamirtukku Ivūrārpakkal vilai ko
ṇṭu Iṟaiyiliyāka vaitta nilam Ammaṇi
toṭṭam teṟku kiḻpāṟkellai pulloḷi
toṭṭattukku meṟkun teṉpāṟkellai ni
roṭukālukku vaṭakku melpāṟkellai karup
pālai meṭṭukkum Itdevar teṅkaṉtoṭṭattu
kku kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai Ammaṇitoṭṭat
tuk kuṇṭukaḷukku teṟkum Itaṟkuriya kiṇaṟum I
ṉṉāṟperellaiyuḷ ḷa(k)eppaṭṭa nilam Uṇ
ṇila moḻiviṉṟi vilaikoṇṭu Iṟaiyiḻicci nā
ṭcoṟṟut tiruvamirtukku vaitteṉ Aṇukkabhi
marpaṭai nāyakaṉ viṭaṅkaṉeṉ Idhanmam Irakṣittā
ṉ śrīpāta meṉ talaimeliṉa . Itu Iṟakkuṉān geṅ
kaiyiṭai kumariyiṭaip paṭṭār ceyta pāvaṅ koḷ(v)vār Aṟama
ṟavaṟka Aṟamallatu tuṇaiyillai .
Digital edition of SII 13.79 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
